name: human-readable-time-formatter
description: Human-Readable Time Formatter is a lightweight and intuitive NPM package that converts timestamps and durations into easy-to-read, human-friendly formats. With this package, you can quickly display time information in ways like "5 minutes ago," "2 hours ago," or as exact durations such as "01:30:00" (for 1 hour, 30 minutes).
